div.head: TO HIS LOVING Cousin Mr. Thomas Smith, all health, grace, and happinesse.
div.p:
ACcept good Cousin, a small token of my loue: value not the heart according to the greatnes of the gift; onely taste and trye, and you shall finde it, though small, yet not altogether fruitlesse, especially if after tryall you trust and make vse thereof. Your kinde acceptance of this shall be a meanes to beget
a better: So wishing Gods grace and blessing to you and all your righteous endeuours I rest,

closer.signed: Your euer louing Cousin HVMPHRY EVERINDEN.
